column2: Administrative Measures Adopted by the Government and the Monetary Board during the Year
“licensed commercial bank” shall have the same meaning as in the Foreign Exchange Act, No. 12 of 2017; “person” shall
have the same meaning as in the Foreign Exchange Act, No. 12 of 2017; “regulated Financial Institution” means a Financial
